Corkasus Glitch Question
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Corkasus Glitch Question
By Neon Oracle on Sunday, May 4, 2008 - 02:32 pm:

I have laid claim to an old friends account in order to ask you a question that's been bugging the heck out of me.
A monster of mine, a Corkasus (Dragon/Beaclon) I lovingly named Xar, was injured during an adventure to the Kawrea Volcano. He went to the hospital, I fretted away, and eventually he came back. However, there was a slight problem.

Whenever I train him, his stats will only increase by an equivalent number to the training gadget level, with the exception of level one. For example, level three gives him a five gain and five loss, level two gives him a two gain, etc. This has been going on for more than three game months now.
Has anyone else experienced this? Have I broken my little dragon? More importantly, is he fixable?

By Neon Oracle on Sunday, May 4, 2008 - 03:12 pm:

Sorry, his stats only increase at an equivalent level to eachother depending on the gadget.

EDIT.

By Neon Oracle on Sunday, May 4, 2008 - 03:13 pm:

And decrease. Edit again.

*flails*

By Infernus on Monday, May 5, 2008 - 12:35 am:

Sounds like he could be getting old, or could need to move up a rank.

If that's not it, what are his percentages like? If he's performing at a low level, maybe it's got something to do with high stress or a loyalty hit due to being injured and spending time in the hospital. An even bigger stretch is a lingering injury - something I've never seen happen.

I'd bet on one of the first two options. I'm not very familiar with injuries.
